ijometri entsonkothileyo: Uphononongo lwezakhiwo zejometri kunye nolwakhiwo oluvela, okanye oluchazwe, ngamanani anzima
amanani antsokothileyo: Amanani ohlobo u-a + bi apho u-a no-b bangamanani okwenene
inxalenye yokwenyani: Igama elikwinani elintsonkothileyo elingaqulathanga iyunithi yentelekelelo njengomba
inxalenye yentelekelelo: Inxalenye yenani elintsonkothileyo elineyunithi ecingelwayo njengomba
ezininzi ezintsonkothileyo: Izithuba kwijiyometri entsonkothileyo ezizii-generalizations of curves and surfaces
iintlobo ezintsonkothileyo zealgebra: Izithuba kwijiyometri entsonkothileyo ezizisombululo kwiiequation zepolynomial
imodeli encinci yenkqubo: Iprogram kwijometri entsonkothileyo yokwahlulwa kwezinto ezininzi ezintsonkothileyo kunye neentlobo ezintsonkothileyo ze-algebraic
izithuba zemoduli: Izithuba kwijometri entsonkothileyo ebeka ipharamitha yolunye uhlobo lwento yejometri
calabi ukucinga: Ingqikelelo kwijiyometri entsonkothileyo engqinwe nguShing-Tung Yau malunga nobukho bodidi olukhethekileyo lwemetric kwizinto ezininzi ezintsonkothileyo.
hitchin-kobayashi imbalelwano: Imbalelwano kwijiyometri entsonkothileyo phakathi kweenyanda ezizinzileyo ze-holomorphic vector kunye nezisombululo kwinxaki ethile eyahlulahluko.
imbalelwano ye-nonabelian hodge: Imbalelwano kwijiyometri entsonkothileyo phakathi kweentlobo ezithile zee-manifolds ezintsonkothileyo kunye neentlobo ezithile zezakhiwo ze-algebra
kakuhler-einstein metrics: Iintlobo ezikhethekileyo zeemetrics kwi-complex manifold eyanelisayo imeko ethile
